item.title: Listen, breakfast dissers, I’m carving a via media between life-limiting fry-ups and muesli. Join me! I’ll remember those who don’t #sinister

item.title: R to @susanhillwriter: You get a free whatever for turning up at things with it and saying how marvellous it is if you get a chance.

item.title: Listening to the Danish String Quartet playing Nielsen. Do you think performers of the same nationality as the composer make the best job of it? Best Elgar I ever heard was played by Russians.
item.dc:creator: @RevRichardColes
